title: Supply and drainage ditches
creator_credit: CSIRO. Film Unit and J.J. Walker
brief_description: Stresses the need for control of irrigation water by the design and construction of ditches capable of handling an adequate flow of water. Describes the design, lay-out and construction of an efficient irrigation system without which fertile land may be ruined by water logging and salting.
